title: 'N/A'
body: In more precise detail, I give the headset itself 3 stars and the mixer 5.  The headphones are... OK. They're reasonably comfy, sound good, and the mic sounds good to others, but I've worn more comfy sets and the mic definitely picks up background noise. It's fine if you're in an isolated environment, but not great if there are other sounds in the room. I've since switched to a different one and that solved those issues.  But the mixer...  This thing is perfect for call center work! Dead simple controls, real-time sidetone (so you can hear yourself as though the headphones weren't there) and a lifesaving orange light to let you know when your mic is muted. All of that is sitting on your desk, not buried in some settings window behind what you're working on. If they sold the mixer by itself, I'd buy another right now and tell everyone in the business to get one.

So I gave a 4.5 over 5.

title: 'N/A'
body: 'Purchased these in January for forty dollars
column5: they are now seventy. The price on these seems to change frequently
column6: so if they seem to high
column8: it will probably change. This is a good headset as far as sound and microphone. My only quirk was a possible quality issue
column10: one of the speakers broke loose from the stopper
column11: so if you aren\'t careful when putting them on
column12: the speaker will come loose from the headset. This could easily have been my fault
column13: so I am only docking 1 star for quality (this would be the first headset I have broken if was my doing). I also wanted to point out that there is no "flat" sound option for the headphones mixer. Other than that
column14: the mixer is a great addition and I love having volume and mute buttons at my fingertips
column15: without having to trace the audio cable for the in-line adjuster.'

title: 'N/A'
body: 'I almost sent this headset back to Amazon. I thought it wasn’t working. The sound level was low
column5: and I couldn’t get the mic to work. I gave it one last try
column6: and found that in addition to the volume control/mixer
column7: there is an inline volume control and mic mute button on the lead close to the headset. Once I’d spotted this
column8: I found these headphones to be excellent. Sound quality is better than I’d anticipated
column9: and perhaps more important than that
column10: they remain comfortable during long periods of use. I can recommend this headset.'
